name: Kye64x

screenshots.caption: Importing all sprites and reads level data (.KYE)

short_description:
------------------------ What is Kye? ---
Kye is a small puzzle game made in 1992 by Colin Garbutt. It was a charity shareware game made and required a donation to the 'Save the Children' organisation to get the full version. Unfortunately the game is not playable on 64-bit computers because it was a 16-bit Windows 3.1 game..


--- About the project ---
This project is made in QBasic x64 (Kye64x has nothing to do with this!!).

--- How can YOU help?? ---
- By being a tester and porting the project to Linux and Mac OSX, contact me if you would like to help me.
- Suggestions.

email: Roblomal@hotmail.com
skype: awesome_roblomal


--- Note(s) ---
- Kye64x is not only for 64-bit computers, it is also for people who have with a 32-bit computer.

- I do NOT own the sprites, name, or any other rights of the original Kye!!
